title: Covid on Campus: Are the Restrictions Overkill?
sub_head: ‘We are all majoring in theater—masking theater.’
body: Editor’s note: This Future View discusses how university campuses are responding to the virus this semester. Next week we’ll ask, “Who gets canceled and why?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Oct. 19. The best responses will be published that night.
